questions.question: What is humidity?

options.text: Amount of water vapour in air

questions.answer: Amount of water vapour in air

questions.question: Which instrument measures humidity?
questions.answer: Hygrometer

questions.question: Relative humidity is expressed in ____.
questions.answer: Percentage

questions.question: Which process changes water vapour into liquid water?
questions.answer: Condensation

questions.question: Clouds are formed due to ____.
questions.answer: Condensation of water vapour

questions.question: Which cloud brings continuous rainfall?
questions.answer: Nimbus

questions.question: Which clouds are found at high altitudes?
questions.answer: Cirrus

questions.question: Which cloud looks like cotton heaps?
questions.answer: Cumulus

questions.question: What happens when air becomes saturated?
questions.answer: Condensation starts

questions.question: Which factor affects humidity the most?
questions.answer: Temperature

questions.question: What is humidity?
questions.answer: Humidity is the amount of water vapour present in the air.

questions.question: What is relative humidity?
questions.answer: Relative humidity is the percentage of water vapour present in the air compared to the maximum it can hold.

questions.question: How are clouds formed?
questions.answer: Clouds are formed when water vapour condenses into tiny droplets.

questions.question: Name different types of clouds.
questions.answer: Cirrus, Cumulus, Stratus and Nimbus are main types of clouds.

questions.question: Why does condensation occur?
questions.answer: Condensation occurs when air cools and becomes saturated.
